org.gservlet

Interface RequestHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFilter, AbstractServlet

    public interface RequestHandler
    Interface for handling requests and producing responses
    Author:
    Mamadou Lamine Ba

    • Method Summary
